statements: DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_name = 'Chair' AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE id = 1 AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_name = 'Widget' AND unit_price < 20.50;
DELETE FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Sale' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM StockTransactions WHERE product_id = 123 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE product_id = 100 AND price > 50;
DELETE FROM StockTransactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM StockHistory WHERE action_type = 'sale');
DELETE FROM warehouses WHERE warehouse_id = 202 AND location = 'New York';
